data: {"generalSituation":"An intense winter monsoon will affect the coast of southern China gradually tomorrow. Winds will strengthen over the region. It will become cold over the coast of Guangdong in the following couple of days. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. With the monsoon being replaced by an easterly airstream, temperatures over the coast of southern China will rise slightly over the weekend, but it will still be cool in the morning. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will move across the seas east of the Philippines and dissipate gradually in the next couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260120","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first. Becoming north force 4 to 5 at night.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods. Dry during the day.
